Detailed Description

Coding of site value for the scheduling A site is used in place of a GlobalId in order to have Site+Partition on only 32bits representation. Its means that Site has 16bits of representation and thus, is less than 32bits for GlobalId. Special value are used to code NO_SITE, ALL_SITE.
